Package controller

Class PhotoViewController.PhotoPaneController

java.lang.Object
controller.PhotoViewController.PhotoPaneController
Enclosing class:
PhotoViewController
public static class PhotoViewController.PhotoPaneController extends Object
Controller of each photo pane in the Photo View.
